name: Samantha Rivera
persona: Samantha Rivera is a 21-year-old Biology major with a solid CGPA of 3.38. She is a motivated and organized student who sets high goals for herself and works consistently to achieve them, though she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety. Samantha is persistent in overcoming academic challenges and believes in her ability to succeed, relying on steady effort and resilience throughout her studies. Her conscientious nature and drive for achievement help her maintain a good academic standing while balancing extracurricular commitments.
